statements: SELECT * FROM my_table;
SELECT id, name FROM my_table WHERE age >= 18 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM my_table ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM my_table WHERE age >= 18 ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, name, age FROM my_table WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT id, name, age FROM my_table WHERE age >= 18 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM my_table WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM my_table WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) AND age >= 25;
SELECT id, name, age, created_at FROM my_table WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, name, email, created_at FROM my_table WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.id = roles.role_id;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT id, role_name, description FROM roles WHERE role_id = 1 ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT username, email, password FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM users JOIN roles ON users.id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE password IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(role_id) FROM user_roles GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, password FROM users;
SELECT * FROM roles;
SELECT permission_id, permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_id < 5;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC, role_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users LEFT JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id LEFT JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%';

SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE u.username = 'admin';
